class.name: RenderDataExtension
class.brief_description: This class allows for a RenderData implementation to be made in GDExtension.
class.description: This class allows for a RenderData implementation to be made in GDExtension.

method.name: _get_camera_attributes
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the [RID] for the implementation's camera attributes object.

method.name: _get_environment
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the [RID] of the implementation's environment object.

method.name: _get_render_scene_buffers
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the implementation's [RenderSceneBuffers] object.

method.name: _get_render_scene_data
method.description: Implement this in GDExtension to return the implementation's [RenderSceneDataExtension] object.
